title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump Faces Deepest Crisis of Presidency
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump Faces Deepest Crisis of Presidency
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Steven Dennis Senate Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Donald Trump facing the deepest crisis of his presidency after a memo written by then-FBI Director James Comey surfaced Tuesday, alleging that the president asked him to drop an investigation of former National Security Adviser Michael Flynn.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
